Str.FuncTxt: local anim = "SKL_TEMPLER_ADVANCEDORDERS" local myHandle = session.GetMyHandle() local buff = info.GetBuffByName(myHandle, "RidingCompanion") if buff ~= nil then anim = "SKL_TEMPLER_ADVANCEDORDERS_RIDE" end return anim
local name = "None" local abil = GetAbility(self, "Templar12") if abil ~= nil and TryGetProp(abil, "ActiveState", 0) == 1 then name = "Templer_AdvancedOrders_Debuff" end return name
local func_name = 'get_remove_debuff_tooltip_' .. TryGetProp(obj, 'ClassName', 'None') local func = _G[func_name] if func == nil then return end return func(obj.Level)

Num.FuncTxt: local x, y, z = GetPos(self) return x
local x, y, z = GetPos(self) return y
local x, y, z = GetPos(self) return z

Str.FuncTxt: local pc = GetSkillOwner(obj) local abil = GetAbility(pc, "Templar2") if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then return "Templer_ShareBuff_Abil" end return "Templer_ShareBuff"
local pc = GetSkillOwner(obj) local abil = GetAbility(pc, "Templar2") if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then return "Templer_ShareBuff_Abil" end return "Templer_ShareBuff"

Num.FuncTxt: local value = 50 + obj.Level * 2; if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return value * 0.5 else return value end
local value = 50 + obj.Level * 2; if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return value * 0.5 else return value end
